siteMetadata.description: Joystream is a video platform controlled, owned, and operated by its users.

hero.title: A video platform protocol empowering
hero.subtitle: Built on and operated by the Joystream blockchain and DAO.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the project in 60 seconds!

videosUploaded.title: Videos
videosUploaded.description: The total number of videos uploaded to the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

commentsAndReactions.title: User Engagement
commentsAndReactions.description: The total number of comments and reactions made on the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: The total number created channels on the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

allFollowers.title: Followers
allFollowers.description: The total number of followers on the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.description: The total number of profiles on the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

creatorRewards.title: Creator Rewards
creatorRewards.description: The total number of rewards on the platform along with a percentage showing their relative increase within the last week.

info.label: Payments are made in JOY tokens
info.text: JOY token is a native crypto asset of Joystream blockchain. It is used for platform governance, purchasing NFTs, trading creator tokens, and covering the blockchain processing fees. You can buy JOY on these <exchanges>exchanges</exchanges>.

tokenomics.title: Token Metrics

price.title: Price
price.description: Current trading price of the token with a trend chart and percentage change from the previous week.

marketCap.title: Market cap
marketCap.description: Total market capitalization, calculated as the current price multiplied by the circulating supply of tokens.

totalSupply.title: Total supply
totalSupply.description: The total amount of tokens that exist in the market, including those not currently circulating.

circulatingSupply.title: Circulating supply
circulatingSupply.description: The total number of tokens currently in circulation in the market.

fdv.title: FDV
fdv.description: The theoretical market capitalization if the total supply of tokens were in circulation, calculated as the current price times the total supply.

tokenomics.modalText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed euismod, diam quis aliquam ultricies.

ecosystem.title:
One Protocol,
a Universe of Applications
ecosystem.subtitle: Joystream is an open-source platform built on blockchain. It supports multiple video streaming apps at once. Videos uploaded on any Joystream app can be seen by users of other apps, helping creators grow their audience.

appsBuiltOnJoystream.title: Check out apps built on Joystream
appsBuiltOnJoystream.info: We've just launched, so our app collection is yet to grow. Check back soon for more exciting apps built on Joystream.

gleev.name: Gleev
gleev.description: Gleev has its sole focus on the Web3 and Crypto content vertical, bringing together the like-minded creators and viewers around the shared passion of the present and the future of Crypto affairs.

l1Media.name: l1.media
l1Media.description: For education, news, science, entertainment beyond borders.

pioneer.name: Pioneer
pioneer.description: Governance hub for community insights and decision-making.

joystats.name: JoyStats
joystats.description: Analytics overview of platform performance and engagement.

jscan.name: JScan
jscan.description: Council dashboard for proposal monitoring and voting.

joyutils.name: JoyUtils
joyutils.description: Essential utilities for common, everyday platform functions.

developers.title: Launch your own video app
developers.subtitle: Spinning up your very own app was never easier before. Configurable feature set, no-code approach, and support from the DAO lowers the set up barriers and lets you focus on your mission instead.

stepOne.title: Customize
stepOne.subtitle: Pick a name, logo & content theme. Update the design and make it yours.

stepTwo.title: Launch
stepTwo.subtitle: Make your webapp available to the world on your domain.

stepThree.title: Build
stepThree.subtitle: Build a community of creators and consumers around your business model.

stepFour.title: Earn
stepFour.subtitle: Get paid a share of the value the creators and audience generates.

payouts.title:
Rewards for
publishing videos
payouts.subtitle: Publishing videos can get creators cash rewards from the Joystream DAO council on a regular basis. Greater rewards are given to videos that demonstrate outstanding quality and creativity.

carousel.title: Recent rewards from the Joystream DAO

info.label: Payments are made in JOY tokens
info.text: JOY token is a native crypto asset of Joystream blockchain. It is used for platform governance, purchasing NFTs, trading creator tokens, and covering the blockchain processing fees. You can buy JOY on these <exchanges>exchanges</exchanges>.

header.title: Powerful New Value Capture Tools
header.subtitle: All apps built from the Atlas open source codebase offer new tools built into Joystream blockchain that helps 99.9% of creators not served by ad-model.

videoNFTs.title: Video monetisation with NFT sales and royalties
videoNFTs.subtitle:
Videos can be turned into NFT minted on the Joystream network and put up for sale.

Creators can choose between fixed price, open auction, and timed auction. With royalties, creators can get a cut every time their NFT is sold again on any app in the network.

carousel.title: Recently sold NFTs on the Joystream blockchain

info.label: NFTs can be sold for JOY tokens
info.text: JOY token is a native crypto asset of Joystream blockchain. It is used for platform governance, purchasing NFTs, trading creator tokens, and covering the blockchain processing fees. You can buy JOY on these <exchanges>exchanges</exchanges>.

hero.title: Itâ€™s time for the community to become channels' main stakeholder
hero.subtitle: Viewers can be turned into evangelists by holding a share in their favorite channels upon purchasing a channel token.

fundraising.title: Creator mint sell on their own terms
fundraising.subtitle: Token supply can follow the demand effortlessly with the Automated Market Maker, while the Custom Sale gives a creator complete control over the terms the token is traded on.

stableIncome.title: A stable stream of tokens every year
stableIncome.subtitle: Patronage gives creators the power to earn a regular annual token supply as compensation for their effort in curating the community and managing token economics.

secureListing.title: Yes to allowlists & vesting schedules. No to monkey business.
secureListing.subtitle: Allowlists put creators in charge of controlling the access to their token, and with vesting schedules (for both creators and buyers) everyone can get aligned and focused on the future.

shareUpside.title:
Support favourites and earn together.
Scout for future starts.
shareUpside.subtitle: Everyone can support creators to receive a portion of their revenue. Creators can reward their audience by sharing some of their channel's earnings.

upcoming.title: Builders Grant Program
upcoming.subtitle: If you are a developer - you can get a grant, development support, business model support and more.

availableActivities.title: Build The Future With Us
availableActivities.subtitle: Joystream is a video platform managed by DAO, which means there are all sorts of ways you can join and earn by contributing to the project.

joystreamDAO.title: Join our DAO.
joystreamDAO.subtitle: Pioneer is the place to participate in community governance and operation. Vote on elections, submit proposals or enter a paid role to support the platform growth.
